half-width.description: The width of the left or right line of the text, the value or percentage, in rpx
half-width.description_zh: 文字左或右边线条宽度，数值或百分比，数值时单位为rpx

bg-color.description: The background color of the entire divider

height.description: The height of the entire divider, in rpx

type.description: Set the line as the accent color

margin-top.description: Distance from the previous element, in rpx
margin-top.description_zh: 与前一个元素的距离，单位rpx

margin-bottom.description: Distance from the latter element, in rpx
margin-bottom.description_zh: 与后一个元素的距离，单位rpx

use-slot.description: Whether or not to use slots to pass in content, if not, there will be no gaps in between
use-slot.description_zh: 是否使用slot传入内容，如果不传入，中间不会有空隙

events.name: click
events.description: Divider component is triggered when it is clicked
